ing: 1/2 head iceberg lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces
1 Bosc pear, cored and cut into bite-sized pieces
1 Asian pear, cored and cut into bite-sized pieces
des: "The fresh taste of pears, balsamic vinaigrette, and feta cheese blend wonderfully in this light salad."
ins: Place the lettuce into a salad bowl, sprinkle on the feta cheese in a layer, and top with a layer of Bosc and Asian pears. Serve with balsamic vinaigrette on the side.
